name: Ultimate Dodgeball - Alpha
description:
Description:

Ultimate Dodgeball is a competitive multiplayer game where you knock your opponents off the area stage using dodgeballs. Last-man standing at the end of each round is awarded 1 point. The first player to reach 3 points is the winner of the game.

Features:

The game currently supports local multiplayer.

Requirements:

Player 1 requires a keyboard and mouse

Players 2 - 4 require a gamepad

Controls:
Keyboard and Mouse

Move - WASD

Aim - Mouse

Throw - LMB

Jump - Space

Pause - ESC or P Key

Gamepad

Move - Left Analog Stick

Aim - Right Analog Stick

Throw - Right Trigger

Jump - Bottom Face Button (A on Xbox Gampad) (X on Dualshock 4)

Pause - Right Options/Menu Button

Known Issues:

Restarting the game creates an extra player.

Throwing a ball very close to a player may not knock the player back.

Sometimes, Game does not award winning player a point. (Draws increases chance it will occur.)

Note:

Game currently does not have in-game BGM or SFX
